claim.en: Hover your mouse over each skill, you'll see how much she loves those technical stuff :P

explanation.title: Now let me explain...
content: This Eileen Punk is NOT a punk.
(Maybe she once was, but not anymore.)

She named herself Punk because the pronunciation of her family name sounds very punky.
And yes, Eileen is her very first original given name.
Feel free to call her, but please pronounce it correctly in English.
(For those Spanish fellows, se pronuncia: Ailin, no Eilin, Gracias!)

description.en: Good question! I don’t know! First, she’s an illustrator; then, she learned graphic design and published some books. Now she is probably coding, which has become her favorite thing recently. However, most of the time, she’s a writer. She tells her own stories to those who are willing to listen.

Eileen is a not-yet-artist, not-too-graphic designer, and she’s on her way to becoming a very web developer. Ella habla muy bien Spanglish. She’s also a typical perfectionist with a positive attitude.

Plus! She's funny :P

Most of the characters in her illustrations are from her fiction novel called Funeral, which is the longest story she has ever written. She started it when she was 12 years old. It hasn't been published. Well... not yet, not until it’s well prepared.

"The story is about a funeral of the heart. It died in love. She put it in a coffin with a bloody black rose. Without the heart, she feels no pain when she gets hurt; she feels no fear when she faces the reality."

She is Shire, the main character of the book. You will find her all over these paintings. She's the pale girl who always cuts herself with a blade.

These are real stories about Eileen and her overseas experience.

At the age of 24, she decided to make her life more adventurous. She quit her job, packed her bags, left her hometown, and came all the way to Europe, to explore the other side of the world.

There, she has met a lot of awesome friends. They are from different countries, different races and religions. They speak different languages and they are at different ages. All the differences, they share one thing in common, they love having fun with each other :P

Before she indulged herself in coding, editorial was her favorite thing. She still loves it, but just spends less time with it.

Why did I say she's a not-too-graphic designer? Because she's more an editor. She not only writes stories and edit words, she loves everything relates to books.

To publish books was her dream as a child. Now since she's edited and published some books and magazines, to publish her own story is a dream that hasn't accomplished. And she will never stop chasing it.

Unlike most of her works, which you can easily tell "oh, that's so Eileen", branding is something she's uncertain about. Sometimes she plays 3D max to render a minimalist packaging project; sometimes plays with papers. That Funeral Invitation Card, she made it for her baby novel "Funeral". She's good at making things by hand. She even makes clothes. Most of her clothes have been transformed at least once.

Don't ever underestimate a lefty and her hands. Her right hand can do what yours can do, and her left one can do what yours probably can't do.

As I said, she's a coder. But if you are looking for a geek girl, then these photos are here to prove you wrong. Or if you still have no idea how crazy, how creative and open-minded she is, these photos are also here to show you.

She dares to be different!

These are the books she has published as an executive editor while she worked for a cultural media from 2010 to 2012. There she had the honor to meet and interview with a bunch of world's famous designers. Besides these architecture books, she also worked as a journalist and column writer for a bilingual graphic design magazine. This is where she finally learned about publishing, and finally one step foreward to her dream.

contact.mailTo: mailto:eileenpunk.web@gmail.com?subject=I want to tell you that...

description.en: Since she is quite small and slim, she made herself this tiny baby slider.
See? She not only speaks good Spanglish. And I'm sure she also understands a bit of some other european languages. Learning languages is definitely one of her favorite hobbies.

title.en: If your English sucks, here're more options for you. Choose wisely!
title.es: Si tu español apesta, escoge aquello en lo que eres bueno!
title.cn: 如果你汉语巨烂，就选个别的靠谱的吧！
title.fr: Si vous ne maîtrisez pas le français, choisissez une autre langue!
title.de: Falls Ihre Deutschkenntnisse nicht ausreichen, wählen Sie bitte eine andere Sprache!
title.it: Se il tuo italiano fa schifo, scegli quella in cui sei bravo!
title.jp: もしあなたの日本語が上手くなければ、他の言語を選んでください。
title.kr: 만약 당신의 한국어가 형평없다면 당신이 잘할 수 있는것을 선택하세요!
title.pt: Se o teu português é mau escolhe a língua em que és bom.
title.ae: إذا كنت لا يتكلمون العربية، الرجاء اختيار لغة أخرى
title.se: Om du inte talar svenska, vänligen välj ett annat språk!
title.ca: Si el teu català fa pudor, escull aquell en el que ets bo!
title.hk: 白話屎到痹呀嘛，揀過第二樣啱睇㗎啦喂！
title.nl: Als jouw Nederlands belabberd is, kies een andere taal!
title.gr: Αν τα ελληνικά σας είναι χάλια, διαλέξτε άλλη γλώσσα!
title.cz: Pokud česky neumíš, zvol si jazyk ve kterém jsi dobrý.
title.ru: Если у Вас плохо с русским, выберите другой язык!
title.th: ถ้าคุณไม่พูดภาษาไทยโปรดเลือกภาษาอื่น!
title.il: אם ידיעתך בשפה העברית לא מספיק טובה, תעברי לשפה אחרת.
title.fi: Jos suomen kielesi on surkeaa, valitse jokin muu missä olet hyvä!
title.tr: Eğer Türk bilgin yoksa, başka bir dil seçiniz!
title.hu: If your Hungarian sucks, there are other options for you!

description.en: * Those languages are listed because of a reason. Either Eileen does speak a little bit of it, or she has been to that language speaking place, or some of her dearest friends are from there.

meta.title: EileenPunk
meta.description: This Eileen Punk never is just one thing. She is a not-yet-artist, not-too-graphic designer, and she's on her way to becoming a very web developer. Ella habla muy bien Spanglish. She's also a typical perfectionist with a positive attitude. Plus! She's funny :P

meta.title: EileenPunk
meta.description: This Eileen Punk never is just one thing. She is a not-yet-artist, not-too-graphic designer, and she's on her way to becoming a very web developer. Ella habla muy bien Spanglish. She's also a typical perfectionist with a positive attitude. Plus! She's funny :P

mainSection.en:
This Eileen Punk is lazy. She hasn't figured out how to deal with her home page yet.

( Did I just say she's hard working?
...Oops :P ... )

BUT! This page is RESPONSIVE.
mainSection.es:
¡Bienvenido!
¡Qué suerte que hablamos la misma lengua!
Te recomiendo que vayas a la página de los comics.
De momento, es la única página que se escribe en castellano.
Pero bueno, como ya hablo spanglish perfectamente, traducirlo a castellano es solo cuestión de tiempo :D
mainSection.cn: 等我哪天喝饱睡足了，中文一定是我首先要翻译的语言。对于那些带着好奇心冒充自己会中文而点击进来的人，要不你还是到别的页面逛逛？浏览器自带的翻译都是瞎扯的，别看了！
mainSection.fr: Quoi qu’on en dise, je trouve que le français est une des plus belles langues du monde! Bien que je n’aie que des bases... Mais croyez-moi, je connais beaucoup de chansons françaises! Apprendre le français est sur ma liste des choses à faire!
mainSection.de: Ich weiss nicht warum, aber die meisten meiner Freunde kommen aus Deutschland. Und einige andere Freunde, die nicht Deutsche sind, sprechen Deutsch. Ich hatte sogar einige deutsche Freunde bevor ich nach Europa kam. Haben wir deutsches Bier getrunken? Klar!
mainSection.it:
Il motivo per cui ho usato l'italiano è perché sono stata in quel paese dal cibo delizioso e lo amo. Penso che ognuno dovrebbe avere degli amici italiani.
Sono sicura che renderebbero la tua vita più interessante :D
mainSection.jp:
私はいつも少しだけ日本語を話します。でもほんの少しだけです。私の父は日本語を話しますが、私に日本語をすべて教え終わりませんでした。
とにかく、もし私が訪れたことのある国でもっとも素晴らしい国を私に選ばせたら、間違いなく日本を選ぶでしょう！
mainSection.kr:
유럽에 왔을 때 만났던 첫번째 친구는 한국인이었습니다. 그리고 제가 프리랜서가 되고 나서 만난 저의 첫 고객 역시 한국인이었습니다.
저는 이러한 상황들이 단순한 우연이라 생각하지 않습니다.
저를 믿어주세요. 한국인들은 어느곳에나 있습니다.
그리고 이러한 편지들은 너무 사랑스럽습니다.
mainSection.pt:
Português e Espanhol são línguas muito parecidas. Ainda assim, eu não falo nada de português. Soa mais suave e doce, o que dá uma sensação totalmente diferente.
A primeira vez que ouvi falar de Portugal foi por causa de Macau, e claro, por causa dos casinos de lá.
mainSection.ae:
The reason why I put Arabic on my list is kind of special.
I don't speak any Arabic and I don't know anyone who speaks it.
However, as you know, I'm a left handed. I'm a perfect Arabic learner! If you prefer to read like this,
.this like write can I
mainSection.se: I heard some great things about Sweden from one of my old colleagues long before I came to Europe. Relax, all positive things. And I heard the people there are so nice!
mainSection.ca:
Que extrany que visc a Barcelona però no parlo quasi res de català.
Dic "quasi" perquè hi ha una frase en català "Molt bé, adeu!"
que dic tots els dies quan surto de casa, pujo amb l'ascensor i veig algun dels meus veïns!
mainSection.hk:
乜啫～～～
睇唔掂啲雞腸啊？咁都冇計㗎喎，都叫咗你翻學比心機溫書㗎啦，話極都唔聽。家下大鍋嘞，及來及去都冇樣嘢啱睇喎～～～人哋翻譯都要諗掂先得㗎，搞掂話你知啦！
mainSection.nl: Als je me vraagt wat mijn favoriet land is in Europa, dan zeg ik zeker: "Nederland". Geloof me, ik heb echt een beetje Nederlands geleerd vorig jaar en begon de taal echt leuk te vinden. Nederlands is een woordenrijke taal. Een boek in het Nederlands is drie keer dikker dan een versie in andere talen, en een Nederlander is drie keer langer dan anderen.
mainSection.gr: Η Ελλάδα μου θυμίζει τα 26α γενέθλιά μου. Πέρασα υπέροχα εκείνη την ημέρα, χωρίς να κάνω τίποτα άλλο εχτός απο το να αράζω στην μαύρη παραλία της Σαντορίνης. Αυτό είναι παράδεισος! Αυτό σίγουρα είναι!
mainSection.cz: Chtěla jsem jet do Česka, fakt jsem chtěla! Zarezervovala jsem si letenku a hotely. Pak se ale něco stalo, a musela jsem svůj výlet odložit. Pokud chceš vědět co se mi v té době stalo, prosím zvol si jiný jazyk a uvidíš zda budeš mít štěstí.
mainSection.ru: Самое ближайшее место к России, где я был - это граница между Россией и севером Китая. Я не помню на что это было похоже. Я был просто ребенком, и это было зимой. Все, что я помню, то, что все было окутано белым снегом , люди прятали нос от холода, и много машин на улице.
mainSection.th: ไทยเป็นภาษาที่น่าสนใจ เพื่อนของฉันและฉันมักจะเลียนแบบเสียงเพื่อความสนุกสนาน บางส่วนของการโฆษณาในประเทศไทยได้งานที่ดีมากของนวัตกรรม และประเทศไทยเป็นสถานที่ที่ฉันควรจะได้รับ แต่ผมยังไม่ได้ เกือบทุกหนึ่งในเพื่อนของฉันได้รับมีอย่างน้อยหนึ่งครั้งและพวกเขาให้บอกฉันว่ามันเป็นสิ่งที่น่ากลัว!
mainSection.il:
אם הייתי צריך לבחור בתרבות המכובדת ביותר בעולם, הייתי אומר יהדות.
החברה הכי טובה שלי היא יהודיה, לא השכח את חג ראש השנה שביליתי בקרב המשפחה שלה.
אני אוהבת את התחבות היהודי. לא השכח את חג ראש השנה שביליתי בקרב משפחה של יהודים.
mainSection.fi: Näitkö sen suomalaisen tytön sarjakuvissani? Opiskelimme aikoinaan espanjaa samassa kielikoulussa. Ja kyllä, hän sanoi, että suomalaiset vauvat tulevat maidon toimittajilta. Kuinka onnekkaita he ovatkaan! Minun äitini sanoi, että minut noukittiin roskiksesta.
mainSection.tr: A very good friend of mine keeps telling me that she wants to go to Turkey. All I am thinking is eating kebab, dancing with a big fat turkey in an oven. I don’t think the turkish people eat turkey. That’s why I said I would dance with one.
mainSection.hu:
I went to Hungary last christmas, and I will never forget that trip heading east of Europe. I lost my beloved grandpa the night I arrived to Budapest. I remember the sky was so clear. I said why don’t you snow? It must had heard me. It brought me a heavy snow the next morning. It was the first snow in 2014. I was wearing all that white snow, canceled the rest of my trip, got on the plane, flew straight back to my family.
I don’t speak Hungarian. This page is for my grandpa in heaven. I hope he can rest in peace. Grandpa, if you can hear me, your little brat misses you so much.

Painting.title: Shire 02
Painting.subtitle: Be brave. I don't have to conquer the fear in my heart. I just need to kill it in my eyes. Then I'll make them look me in the eye.
Painting.description: Shire: "Be brave. I don't have to conquer the fear in my heart. I just need to kill it in my eyes. Then I'll make them look me in the eye."

Painting.title: Shire 03
Painting.subtitle: They told me to stay strong. So I do things they wouldn't dare to do, be the one they wouldn't expect me to be.
Painting.description: Shire: "They told me to stay strong. So I do things they wouldn't dare to do, be the one they wouldn't expect me to be."

Painting.title: Shire 01
Painting.subtitle: Kneeling down in front of her grave. I held a thorny rose in my hand, it drew my blood as the thorns pierced through the skin...
Painting.description: Shire: "Kneeling down in front of her grave. I held a thorny rose in my hand, it drew my blood as the thorns pierced through the skin of my clenched little fist. I drew her a big red rose with my blood, like the one I did on her thigh with the blade she gave me. She loved it. She said she was proud of her little girl."

Painting.title: Fascination
Painting.subtitle: I Will Never Commit Suicide. I just enjoy cutting myself. I just have a big fascination with blood. That's all...
Painting.description: Shire: "I Will Never Commit Suicide. I just enjoy cutting myself. I just have a big fascination with blood. That's all..."

Painting.title: Her Death
Painting.subtitle: I already died once, the day you left me. this would be my second time, and the last time.
Painting.description: Shire: "I already died once, the day you left me. this would be my second time, and the last time."

Painting.title: At the Very Beginning
Painting.subtitle: From the very beginning of the story... What shaped who you were, shapes who I am.
Painting.description: Shire: "From the very beginning of the story... What shaped who you were, shapes who I am."

Painting.title: Make-up
Painting.subtitle: I woke up, found my face fucked up. My makeup totally went wrong. Looked like i'd cried like shit the night before, which i would never admit.
Painting.description: Shire: "I woke up, found my face fucked up. My makeup totally went wrong. Looked like i'd cried like shit the night before, which i would never admit."

Painting.title: What Have Changed
Painting.subtitle: I was still young. My hair was still the color of honey. My arms were still clean and neat. I was still smoking cigarette...
Painting.description: XZB: "I was still young. My hair was still the color of honey. My arms were still clean and neat. I was still smoking cigarette. My bed was still the color of my favourite dark green. I was still waiting for her."

Painting.title: You Belong with Me
Painting.subtitle: Don't prove me anything. I don't care if I could trust you. I'm sorry it's too late. I'm sorry I alraedy love you irredeemably.
Painting.description: Shire: "Don't prove me anything. I don't care if I could trust you. I'm sorry it's too late. I'm sorry I alraedy love you irredeemably."

Painting.title: From Heaven
Painting.subtitle: To my precious friend from heaven. How are you doing up there? Are you still holding your guitar, singing The Bear and the Bee?
Painting.description: Shire: "To my precious friend from heaven. How are you doing up there? Are you still holding your guitar, singing The Bear and the Bee?"

Painting.title: Seventeen
Painting.subtitle: We all have only once 17. Those who ruined my 17, I've ruined the rest of their lives.
Painting.description: Shire: "We all have only once 17. Those who ruined my 17, I've ruined the rest of their lives."

Painting.title: Memory of Your Face
Painting.subtitle: 10 years. I've lost the part of memory that used to be full of your faces. Even though I once looked so hard into your eyes, tried so hard to feel every inch of your skin.
Painting.description: Shire: "10 years. I've lost the part of memory that used to be full of your faces. Even though I once looked so hard into your eyes, tried so hard to feel every inch of your skin."

Painting.title: I love you
Painting.subtitle: I love you. I was born to love you, to protect you. Some day soon, I will be a grown-up. I will be strong enough to heal your wound.
Painting.description: Saya: "I love you. I was born to love you, to protect you. Some day soon, I will be a grown-up. I will be strong enough to heal your wound."

Painting.title: No Fear
Painting.subtitle: Pain is one thing, the fear of it is another thing.
Painting.description: Shire: "Pain is one thing, the fear of it is another thing."

Painting.title: Pull out
Painting.subtitle: I believe loving someone is like an arrow thrusted into your body. If you try to remove it out of you, it just won't stop bleeding, and will hurt like hell.
Painting.description: Shire: "I believe loving someone is like an arrow thrusted into your body. If you try to remove it out of you, it just won't stop bleeding, and will hurt like hell."

Painting.title: Pink
Painting.subtitle: I want to be free, as free as when the wind blows, my hair flies.
Painting.description: Shire: "I want to be free, as free as when the wind blows, my hair flies."

Painting.title: Bloody Black
Painting.subtitle: They said that black roses only grow in the dark.
Painting.description: Shire: "They said that black roses only grow in the dark."
